creator: Meshwork Technology Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Some point we all need to go to the doctor and if you have an urgent issue like the common flu, fever and any other health issue, you can't wait and you need treatment immediately but if you're like most patients getting treatment means within days or even weeks for an appointment then spending hours getting to the doctor's office and sitting in a room filled with sick people all for just a few minutes of your doctor.

With the help of doktors app you could see your doctor without the wait times without even leaving your home. DOKTORS App is a best solution for providing a high quality convenient care on your schedule, getting a prescription refill an answer to a quick question, urgent treatment for minor medical issues which only takes a few minutes like it should with the visit seeing your doctor is as easy as logging into your account answering a few questions about your condition and clicking the request and your doctor will receive your request and let you know when they'll be ready to see you then we'll connect you with your doctor right away. Your doctor will diagnose your condition answer your questions and if needed send a prescription to your pharmacy. So it's ready to pick up when you arrive. We make it as a simple and you can rest easy knowing that your health information is safe and secure. Ask your doctor today by registering your DOKTORS app account for your next doctor's visit gets simplified.

Have a question for your doctor or need to refill a prescription? Now you can book your appointment with your doctors using the DOKTORS app. DOKTORS app provides secure appointment bookings for all your health concerns and questions for your primary care physicians and specialists and with DOKTORS App you can also view test results and refill your prescriptions with the click of a button. Quick communications with your doctors just be possible with DOKTORS App.

DOKTORS App offering instant communication with the doctors of your nearby locations. In this busy days, some many of you are facing inconveniences with the time consuming patients with simple common ailments preferred to see a doctor immediately and skip the waiting room. Whether you are looking for instant doctor appointment, lab tests, daily health check-up’s, order a medicine and even talk to health care experts. DOKTORS App cares about each and every one and provides them the best healthcare experience possible.

Using DOKTORS App you can consult a medical professional for a fast convenient advice anytime anywhere in india via Android smartphone or tablet. To get started simply download the DOKTORS app from the Google play. Register on the app and log in. Here you have the option to see a doctor immediately or book appointment for later on. To book a doctor later just choose your preferred medical professionals followed by time and date and automatic appointment reminders will be sent out for your appointment. To see a doctor immediately simply select consulting and choose your preferred medical professionals from our list. After selecting see a doctor you may add some basic info such as medical history and the symptoms that you're experiencing. Once your booking has been confirmed you're ready to see the doctor consultation will happen over a call or chat. So it's just like you're in the doctor's clinic when the consultation is complete you will be provided with a quick summary as well as prescribed medication. With the Doktors app you'll always have instant access to a medical professional for a fast and simple advice. Save time and speak to a doctor now anytime anywhere in India.

DOKTORS App offers a complete solution and affordable platform that allows medical clinics and hospitals to offer secure consulting and messaging to their patients through your Android smartphone devices.
descriptionShort: Doktors App helps you with all your online Appointment

Doktors is built on a strong technological foundation with a focus on ease of use of all concerned.
The mission of Doktors is to reach health care services to the masses in a hassle-free and affordable manner.
The feature-rich Doktors offers the following advantages to its patients: a one-tap appointment booking, immediate and by appointment online doctor consultation, in-clinic consultation, maintenance of patient records, full security measures to protect all data, respect to the privacy of all concerned, etc. For the benefit of its patients, Doktors verifies all the doctors in terms of their education, experience, etc. before adding them to their network of doctors. This ensures the quality of medical advice to the patients.
Doktors strongly believes that prevention is better than cure and keeping that in mind it regularly provides its patients’ health tips and blogs to remain healthy and fit. Moreover, it answers patients’ specific health-related queries free of charge to give them proper guidance.
Doktors has clearly defined policies and works with complete transparency so as not to leave any ambiguity over any matter. That eliminates any doubts about future disputes with its partners.
Multiple branches of medical science are represented by the best doctors in their individual disciplines, ensuring reliability in the medical treatment of the patients. Simply put, whatever disease a person may be suffering from, he will find a cure. Not only that, but he may also choose treatment of General physician, Dental, Eye Specialist, Cardiology as per his liking.
The app offers a host of features for the convenience of doctors and clinics allowing them to focus on treating the patients whereas the back-end work is taken care of by the app and the Doktors support team. The Doktors allows the affiliated doctors and clinics to check and manage their appointments, check their total engagements, fees, access their patients’ health records with their concern, etc. Features apart, the benefits available to the patient on the Doktors are-

Online Doctor Appointment -
Looking for the right doctor that can guide you from the comfort of your home? If so, your search ends here! Simply download the app and book an appointment online with any doctor around your locality. You can choose from thousands of doctors 24*7 and specialists in the top 3000+ clinics and hospitals across India. This is the medical platform for doctors.

Clinic Appointment System -
Doktors Clinic Management Software gives you a user interface in all languages, easy to use by a one-click switch between languages, ideal for managing Hospital Chains all around the world.

Video Consultation Service -
Doktors’ video consultation service allows patients to speak or make a video call with our specialists over the computer, smartphone, or tablet at the comfort of your home.
We have state-of-the-art healthcare delivery systems, which enable seamless online consultation and e-prescription that can be printed. Our dexterous crew of professionals is available around the clock to assist you with any healthcare-related requirements.
With our video consultation feature, patients can simply book an appointment online and get a video consultation from home. This would ultimately help both doctors and patients to avoid the risk of stepping out during the COVID-19 crises.
descriptionShort: We provide the right solutions for your health. Consult doctor online 24/7
